blogs.title: My First Blog
blogs.body: I'm trying to use variable fonts for the first time, namely Quicksand from Google fonts. Here are the tags it gives you...
blogs.author: mario

blogs.title: Opening Party!
blogs.body: It's definitely using Quicksand on the page but the problem is that when I change the font weight from 400 to 500 it doesn't change. 300 does nothing either but if I change it to a value above 550 it seems to go very bold. It's as if I've set it to download just two different weights, a very light one and a very bold one.
blogs.author: yoshi
